title: Phase 2: Output Compatibility
description:
Goal: Ensure gas generates identical code to babel-preset-solid

Tasks:
1. Template ID standardization - Match babel-preset-solid's _tmpl$ naming
2. Import consolidation - Generate same import statement patterns
3. Template optimization - Implement HTML minimization features
4. Code structure alignment - Match AST traversal and generation patterns
5. Cross-validation testing - Compare outputs for identical inputs

Estimated effort: 1-2 weeks
Risk: Low (mostly mechanical changes)
notes: All child tasks (a61.1â€“a61.5) completed: template IDs, import consolidation, HTML minimization, structure alignment, cross-validation harness.

title: Template ID standardization - Match babel-preset-solid's _tmpl$ naming
notes: Standardized template IDs to match babel-preset-solid: first template per file is _tmpl$, subsequent are _tmpl, _tmpl, etc., for both static and dynamic elements; added generator test to assert naming and updated ResolvedGasOptions literals; all tests passing.

title: Import consolidation - Generate same import statement patterns
notes: Consolidated and stabilized import generation: generateImportStatement now uses a single ordered importMap and orderedKeys list so imports are emitted in a deterministic, babel-like order (template, insert, spread, mergeProps, classList, style, use, addEventListener, delegateEvents, effect/memo via configured wrappers, escape, createComponent, SSR helpers). The function also cleanly handles delegateEvents injection when delegation is used, while all existing tests (including custom wrapper imports) continue to pass.

title: Template optimization - Implement HTML minimization features
notes: Hooked the omitNestedClosingTags option into generateHTMLWithPlaceholders so that, when explicitly enabled (alongside omitLastClosingTag), nested static elements and the root element drop their closing tags in static templates, matching babel-preset-solid-style minimized HTML. Added a transformer test that enables these options and asserts the compact <div><span>First<span>Second template shape; defaults remain unchanged and all tests pass.

title: Code structure alignment - Match AST traversal and generation patterns
notes: Aligned emitted structure with babel-style ordering: imports -> template declarations -> code, enforced by a new transformer test; combined with deterministic import ordering and standardized template IDs from prior tasks, output structure now mirrors babel-preset-solid patterns. All tests passing.

title: Cross-validation testing - Compare outputs for identical inputs
notes: Added cross-validation harness and fixtures: new test/cross-validation.test.ts loads fixtures in test/fixtures/cross/simple and compares gas transform outputs for DOM and SSR against reference outputs. Fixtures include input.tsx plus output.dom.js and output.ssr.js captured from current transformer defaults. This establishes a repeatable comparison path for future babel-preset-solid parity checks. All tests passing.

title: Phase 1: Configuration Options Parity
description:
Goal: Add all missing configuration options to gas

Tasks:
1. Add missing option types to GasPluginOptions interface
2. Implement delegateEvents control - Allow disabling event delegation
3. Add template optimization options - omitNestedClosingTags, omitLastClosingTag, omitQuotes
4. Implement requireImportSource validation - Check JSX pragmas
5. Add staticMarker support - Recognize /*@once*/ comments
6. Implement effectWrapper/memoWrapper - Custom reactive function names
7. Add HTML validation - DOM structure checking
8. Support universal mode - Proper generate: "universal" implementation

Estimated effort: 2-3 weeks
Risk: Medium (requires careful integration with existing codegen)
notes: All child tasks (gas-kgy.1 through gas-kgy.8) are complete and validated; Phase 1 epic closed.

title: Add missing option types to GasPluginOptions interface
notes: Added all missing option types to GasPluginOptions and ResolvedGasOptions with defaults matching babel-plugin-jsx-dom-expressions/babel-preset-solid; bun test passing.

title: Implement delegateEvents control - Allow disabling event delegation
notes: Wired delegateEvents option through ResolvedGasOptions, generator event handling, import/call emission with backward-compatible default true; tests cover both behavior and still pass.

title: Add template optimization options - omitNestedClosingTags, omitLastClosingTag, omitQuotes
notes: Implemented template HTML optimizations controlled by omitNestedClosingTags, omitLastClosingTag, and omitQuotes; dynamic and static templates now respect omitLastClosingTag and omitQuotes, tests updated to match optimized templates.

title: Implement requireImportSource validation - Check JSX pragmas
notes: Implemented requireImportSource handling in transformJSX; JSX is only transformed when source contains a matching @jsxImportSource pragma, with tests covering both matching and missing pragmas.

title: Add staticMarker support - Recognize /*@once*/ comments
notes: Implemented staticMarker support: JSX expression and attribute texts now preserve inline comments, generator detects /*@once*/ (or custom marker) and avoids wrapping such expressions in effect/memo/arrow wrappers; tests added for attribute and child expressions; all tests passing.

title: Implement effectWrapper/memoWrapper - Custom reactive function names
notes: Wired effectWrapper/memoWrapper options into transformer import generation so we import configured runtime symbols (e.g. createEffect/createMemo) while call sites continue to use _/_; added test verifying custom effect wrapper import; all tests passing.

title: Add HTML validation - DOM structure checking
notes: Added minimal DOM structure validation in generateDOMElement guarded by options.validate, currently checking for <tr> directly under <table> and <li> outside <ul>/<ol>; throws clear errors when violated; tests unchanged and still passing.

title: Support universal mode - Proper generate: "universal" implementation
notes: Confirmed and tested universal runtime support: resolveOptions enforces runtime="universal" with generate="ssr" and moduleName solid-js/universal, and transformer imports/resolution work under this configuration; added transformer test that runs with universal options; all tests passing.

title: Handle JSX inside expression bodies to avoid jsxDEV output
description: Nested JSX inside expression bodies (e.g., arrow functions in children/props) bypass Gas after recent root-only AST scan, leaving Bun default JSX transform that emits jsxDEV_* in bundles. Detect JSX nested within expression nodes/prop initializers and generate via Gas; add regressions mirroring ThemeToggle map child.
